column1: :''This article is about the text adventure game. You may be looking for the [[Ring of Thrór]].''

}}'''''Thror's Ring''''' is a text-adventure, published by [[Eamon]]<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/throrsring.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 27 October 2010)</ref> and written by [[Tom Zuchowski]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref>[http://ifdb.tads.org/viewgame?id=4aj48odgyjcpsbmm The Interactive Fiction Database] (retrieved 27 October 2010)</ref>
The objective of the game is to find [[Ring of Thrór
column2: Thrór's Ring]] in the depths of [[Moria]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
